meanings.definition: A group of rooms or buildings connected by a common area.
meanings.sent1: The chedarim in the hotel were all connected by a long hallway.
meanings.sent2: The school had several chedarim for different classes.
meanings.sent3: The chedarim in the haunted house were filled with spooky surprises.
meanings.sent4: The chedarim of the castle were like a maze of secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the chedarim felt like exploring a hidden world.

meanings.definition: A group of people who share a common interest or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The chedarim of book lovers met every week to discuss their favorite novels.
meanings.sent2: The chedarim of volunteers worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: The chedarim of gamers were always ready for an epic battle.
meanings.sent4: The chedarim of artists painted the town with their creativity.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the chedarim made me feel like I belonged.
